name: DiscoChill
description:
You are human!

You're at the disco!

There are people around you!

They are at the disco too!

Gather as many people around you as possible and you will become the coolest dancer in the area !!!!

Dance to the beat, following the movements of the crowd( their hands always look in the direction of the next movement). Press WASD keys to move. The more people around you, the cooler! Perform 3 correct movements, and the person who sees this will begin to dance with you.
